text: oms of Spastic paraplegia 11? Signs and symptoms of spastic paraplegia 11, include: Spasticity (progressive muscle stiffness) Paraplegia (eventual paralysis of the lower limbs)   Numbness, tingling, or pain in the arms and legs Disturbance in the nerves used for muscle movement Intellectual disability Exaggerated reflexes of the lower limbs  Speech difficulties  Reduced bladder control  Muscle wasting  Less common features, include: Difficulty swallowing  High-arched feet  Scoliosis  Involuntary
